name: hide-taskview-and-widgets
title: Hide Taskview and Widgets
deepDescription: Disables both the Task View button and the Widgets panel by updating the user's Explorer taskbar settings in the registry, removing the icons and preventing them from appearing on the taskbar.
description: Hides the Taskview and Widgets buttons on the taskbar.
modal:
This will REMOVE the Windows Widgets feature entirely.

To restore it later, you will need to run:
winget install 9MSSGKG348SP

or search 'Windows Web Experience Pack' in the Microsoft Store.
